name: Enter the Gun Jam
description:
This was a game for the 2020 GMTK game jam.  the theme was "Out of Control" I went with a bunch of out of control robots taking over a manufacturing facility, and maybe something else.

its an on rails fps where you actually don't aim.  you just shoot.

just a head's up this uses unity's HDPL so it will tax your graphics card a bit more than a normal game jam game.
